newsitem.title: USA: Tech Squared posts Q4 loss as sales rise.
newsitem.headline: Tech Squared posts Q4 loss as sales rise.

text.p: Tech Squared Inc on Monday its loss for the fourth quarter ended March 31 was about even with the loss posted a year ago, even though sales rose 32 percent.

The company reported a fiscal fourth-quarter net loss of $254,000, or $0.02 a share, versus a loss of $203,000, or $0.02. Sales climbed to $10.9 million from $8.2 million in the corresponding quarter last year.
Tech Squared said it would hold its focus on increasing the sales of its microprocessor products and on expanding the growth of Digital River Inc, in which the company owns a 60 percent stake.
Tech Squared markets and distributes microcomputer hardware and software products to businesses.
Its shares closed unchanged Monday at 1/4.
